  • Method Details

    • addEmployee

      public boolean addEmployee(List<Employee> list, String name, String surname, String username, String password)
      This method is used to add a new employee.
      Parameters:
      name - It is the name of the new employee.
      surname - It is the surname of the new employee.
      username - It is the username of the new employee.
      password - It is the password of the new employee.
      list - It is the Employee list.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value:
      false : if the method was successful and therefore the new employee was added to the employees list;
      true : if the username of the employee to be added already exists.

    • rmvEmployee

      public boolean rmvEmployee(List<Employee> list, String username)
      This method is used to remove an employee.
      Parameters:
      username - It is the username of the employee account you want to delete.
      list - It is the Employee list.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value:
      false : if the method was successful and therefore the employee's account has been removed from the employees list;
      true : if the username of the employee to be deleted does not exist.

    • addProduct

      public int addProduct(List<ElettronicDevice> list, String name, int id, String producer, float price, int amount)
      This method is used to add a new product.
      Parameters:
      name - It is the name of the new product.
      id - It is the Identification code of the new product.
      producer - It is the producer of the new product.
      price - It is the price of the new product.
      amount - It is the amount of the new product.
      list - It is the ElettronicDevice list.
      Returns:
      Returns an integer:
      0 : if the product was added successfully;
      1 : if the amount of the product is less than or equal to zero;
      2 : if the price of the product is less than or equal to zero;
      3 : if the id of the product you want to add already exists.

    • rmvProduct

      public int rmvProduct(List<ElettronicDevice> list, int id)
      This method is used to remove a product.
      Parameters:
      id - It is the Identification code of the product to be removed.
      list - It is the ElettronicDevice list.
      Returns:
      Returns an integer:
      0 : if the product has been successfully deleted;
      1 : if the id of the product to be deleted does not exist.
